definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Grads get offers in grassroots-level schools teaching in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 廣東應屆畢業生獲得農村學校教書的就業機會。

sentences.english: There is consider-able pessimism about job opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 人們對就業機會相當悲觀。

sentences.english: You only get one opportunity like this and I had to take it.
sentences.chinese: 既然我只得到了一個就業機會，那當然要好好利用。

sentences.english: Middle and small-sized firms are job creators.
sentences.chinese: 中小型企業是製造就業機會的源泉。

sentences.english: The plan has the added advantage of bringing employment to rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃另有一個優點，就是給屯子帶來了就業機會。

sentences.english: The manufacturing sector has shed more than a million jobs.
sentences.chinese: 製造業裁掉了過百萬個就業機會。

sentences.english: I wonder how many manufacturing jobs Baird is taking with him.
sentences.chinese: 我挺想知道貝爾德帶上了多少製造業就業機會。

sentences.english: All African Americans hope that their employments will be based on EOE.
sentences.chinese: 所有美國黑人都希望他們享有平等的就業機會。

sentences.english: Employment opportunities are limited in the man's racially segregated neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 就業機會在他所在的種族隔離區確實有限。

sentences.english: Large print buffer handles even very graphics-intensive jobs.
sentences.chinese: 大打印緩衝處理甚至非常圖形密集型的就業機會。

sentences.english: The town relies on the seasonal tourist industry for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 這個城鎮依靠季節性旅遊業提供就業機會。

sentences.english: They are dependent on Amercia for jobs and hard currency.
sentences.chinese: 他們的社會依賴美國帶來的就業機會和貨幣硬流通。

sentences.english: A favorable aspect about MNCs is that they reate jobs in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 跨國公司在國外提供就業機會，這是它受歡迎的一面。

sentences.english: But then, who is talking seriously about job creation these days?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，今天是誰在義正言辭地說要提供就業機會的呢？

sentences.english: There are dozens of things we could do that would create jobs.
sentences.chinese: 只要我們肯做，創造就業機會的門路有很多。

sentences.english: For a place like Quincy that's a good number of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 對於像昆西這是一個相當數量的就業機會的地方。
